content:
Reduced Cost Ordering Example


    Default: S2
    S3 :- ca ɮ.0 & trestbps < 106
    Default: S1
    S3 :- ca ɮ.0 & trestbps < 106
    HE :- cp ° ASYMPT & trestbps > 132
    Default: S2
    S3 :- ca > 2.0 & trestbps < 106
    HE :- cp ° ASYMPT & trestbps > 132
    S4 :- oldpeak > 2 & trestbps > 138
    Default: S1

    Progression of Ordered Rules


    HE :- thalach < 141 & thalach > 125
    & testbps > 130
    HE :- cp ° ASYMPT & trestbps > 132
    HE :- thal = NORM & sex = FEMALE
    S1 :- oldpeak < 1.2 & thal ° NORM
    S1 :- trestbps > 140 & oldpeak < .4
    & cp = ABNANG
    S2 :- thal = FIX & cp = NOTANG
    S3 :- ca > 2.0 & trestbps < 106
    S4 :- oldpeak > 2 & trestbps > 138

    Pool of Unordered Rules
